verses.verse: Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> unto me, Go <WH3212> <WH8798> yet, love <WH157> <WH8798> a woman <WH802> beloved <WH157> <WH8803> of her friend <WH7453>, yet an adulteress <WH5003> <WH8764>, according to the love <WH160> of the YY <WH3068> toward the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, who look <WH6437> <WH8802> to other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and love <WH157> <WH8802> flagons <WH809> of wine <WH6025>.
So I bought <WH3739> <WH8799> her to me for fifteen <WH6240> <WH2568> pieces of silver <WH3701>, and for an homer <WH2563> of barley <WH8184>, and an half homer <WH3963> of barley <WH8184>:

And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto her, Thou shalt abide <WH3427> <WH8799> for me many <WH7227> days <WH3117>; thou shalt not play the harlot <WH2181> <WH8799>, and thou shalt not be <WH1961> <WH8799> for another man <WH376>: so will I also be for thee.

For the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall abide <WH3427> <WH8799> many <WH7227> days <WH3117> without a king <WH4428>, and without a prince <WH8269>, and without a sacrifice <WH2077>, and without an image <WH4676>, and without an ephod <WH646>, and without teraphim <WH8655>:

Afterward <WH310> shall the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> return <WH7725> <WH8799>, and seek <WH1245> <WH8765> the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430>, and David <WH1732> their king <WH4428>; and shall fear <WH6342> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> and his goodness <WH2898> in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>.
